CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get -y install --no-install-recommends gnupg &&         curl -s https://deb.nodesource.com/gpgkey/nodesource.gpg.key |         apt-key add - &&         echo "deb https://deb.nodesource.com/node_8.x stretch main" >             /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nodesource.list &&         apt-get update &&         apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y nodejs &&         apt-get clean &&         rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
